Description: TEAM MANAGEMENT: Direct, mentor, and guide a team of 2-3 business development associates and analysts, ensuring the alignment of tasks and maximization of output. Team Leadership : Proficiency in leading and managing a team, endorsing collaboration and efficiency. Business Acumen : Demonstrated business savvy to interpret market trends, business analytics, and strategic insights. Ability to understand and predict market movements and their impact on the organization. Communication Mastery : Excellent communication skills, with the capacity to articulate complex ideas clearly, manage and lead difficult conversations, and drive alignment among stakeholders. Strategic Thinking : Ability to take a holistic view of situations and challenges, foresee potential obstacles and opportunities, and craft strategic approaches for sustainable growth.Job Details
